lead_paragraph: Ms. Warren has become the most conspicuous Democrat opposing President Obama’s Trans-Pacific Partnership but has not been involved in shaping it.

headline.print_headline: Warren, From Senate Sideline, Is Face of Attack on Trade Bill
headline.main: From Senate Sideline, Elizabeth Warren Is Face of Attack on Trade Bill

snippet: Ms. Warren has become the most conspicuous Democrat opposing President Obama’s Trans-Pacific Partnership but has not been involved in shaping it.
abstract: Sen Elizabeth Warren has become face of Democratic opposition to Trans-Pacific Partnership, despite fact that she has had no official role in crafting its legislative language or in opposing it; Warren has used highly effective public relations strategy to cite her concerns about bill's impact on financial regulations, which has crowded out voices of other Democratic senators who have led legislative opposition to deal.
